1.name: Applied Calculus
1.description: Interactive classrooms and well-crafted problems promote student learning. Since it's inception, the hallmark of Applied Calculus is its innovative and engaging problems. The Calculus Consortium pioneered and incorporates the approach called the 'Rule of Four'. The Rule of Four, presents ideas graphically, numerically, symbolically, and verbally, thereby encouraging students with a variety of learning styles to deepen their understanding as they work through a wide variety of problem types.

2.name: The Alchemist
2.description: This is the magical story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who dreams of travelling the world in search of a worldly treasure as fabulous as any ever found. From his home in Spain he journeys to the markets of Tangiers, and from there into the Egyptian desert, where a fateful encounter with the alchemist awaits him. With Paulo’s visionary blend of spirituality, magical realism and folklore, 'The Alchemist 'is a story with the power to inspire nations and change people’s lives

3.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
3.description: 'Shoot all the Bluejays you want, if you can hit 'em, but remember it's a sin to kill a Mockingbird.' Lawyer Atticus Finch gives this advice to his children as he defends the real mockingbird of Harper Lee's classic novel - a black man charged with the rape of a white girl. Through the young eyes of Scout and Jem Finch, Harper Lee explores with exuberant humour the irrationality of adult attitudes to race and class in the Deep South of the 1930s. The conscience of a town steeped in prejudice, violence and hypocrisy is pricked by the stamina of one man's struggle for justice. But the weight of history will only tolerate so much...

4.name: 5 Comic Book Mystery Bundle – Superman
4.description: In this mystery comic book bundle you will get 5 randomly selected Superman comics from our expansive inventory!

5.name: 5 Comic Book Mystery Bundle – Batman
5.description: In this mystery comic book bundle you will get 5 randomly selected Batman comics from our expansive inventory!

6.name: The New Official K53 Manual
6.description: The New Official K53 Manual is a comprehensive and effective guide to passing your Learner’s Licence and K53 Driver’s Licence – first time. Covering both light and heavy motor vehicles, and motorcycles, each chapter discusses the knowledge and skills expected of you. The learner’s section explains the K53 Defensive Driving principles, road signs and the rules of the road, with questions and detailed answers to test your knowledge. At the end of this section there is a test similar to that compiled by traffic departments. The driver’s section explains how candidates are tested and what examiners look out for, with step-by-step instructions on how to perform every manoeuvre in both the yard and road tests. With detailed, full-colour illustrations throughout, this is the definitive manual for both the learner’s and driver’s tests.

7.name: 8115 A PRISONERS HOME
7.description: Using this unassuming house as the setting, 8115: A Prisoner's Home collects some of Kumalo's most historically important and beautiful images of the Mandela family and their home, giving us a unique insight into the life of the family who would have a profound effect on South Africa's political landscape.

8.name: RICH DAD POOR DAD
8.description: April of 2022 marks a 25-year milestone for the personal finance classic Rich Dad Poor Dad that still ranks as the #1 Personal Finance book of all time. And although 25 years have passed since Rich Dad Poor Dad was first published, readers will find that very little in the book itself has changed - and for good reason. While so much in our world is changing a high speed, the lessons about money and the principles of Rich Dad Poor Dad haven't changed. Today, as money continues to play a key role in our daily lives, the messages in Robert Kiyosaki's international bestseller are more timely and more important than ever.

9.name: Business Cases from South African Companies
9.description: Business Cases from South African Companies is an engaging collection of case studies dealing with real-life businesses. Written by business owners, the stories are unique and inspiring to students, practitioners and would-be entrepreneurs. Owners, entrepreneurs and corporates (from SMMEs to larger companies) share their frustrations, successes, and challenges on starting and running successful businesses.

10.name: 48 Laws Of Power
10.description: Drawn from 3,000 years of the history of power, this is the definitive guide to help readers achieve for themselves what Queen Elizabeth I, Henry Kissinger, Louis XIV and Machiavelli learnt the hard way. Law 1: Never outshine the master Law 2: Never put too much trust in friends; learn how to use enemies Law 3: Conceal your intentions Law 4: Always say less than necessary. The text is bold and elegant, laid out in black and red throughout and replete with fables and unique word sculptures. The 48 laws are illustrated through the tactics, triumphs and failures of great figures from the past who have wielded - or been victimised by - power.

11.name: Stasies
11.description: AGTERGROND Die kortverhaalskrywer Hannah Loubser hunker na ’n watergat waar sy gereeld uitgehang het, bo in Kloofstraat, en die regulars daar. Een van hulle word vermoor en sy spekuleer dat elkeen daar ’n motief gehad het om haar dood te maak. Sy wil ’n soort intellektuele speurverhaal skryf “oor verlore, verdwene karakters en ’n vreemde, onbeklinkte liefdesverhaal. Die ruimte is Kaapstad, die stadskom vol weelde en skreiende armoede, religie en geweld. “’n Stad van onheil, ’n stad van ongerymdhede.” “… ’n reservoir van diksie, geluide; ’n eggokamer van onrus.” Dis die elegiese verslag van ’n stad wat radikaal verander het, ’n opskryf van ’n wêreld wat nie meer bestaan nie, ’n fassinerende dokument in die tradisie van Jeanette Winterson, Sigrid Nunez, Anne Michaels. Al is dit fragmentaries kom daar ’n sekere samehang en balans na vore; ’n droomlogika.

12.name: Winnie and Nelson
12.description: One of the most celebrated political leaders of our time, Nelson Mandela has been written about by many biographers and historians. But in one crucial area, his life remains largely untold: his marriage to Winnie Madikizela-Mandela. During his years in prison, Nelson grew ever more in love with an idealised version of his wife, courting her in his letters as if they were young lovers frozen in time. But Winnie, every bit his political equal, found herself increasingly estranged from her jailed husband’s politics.

13.name: Business Management for Entrepreneurs 5th Edition
13.description: Being a successful entrepreneur in 2020s involves more than enthusiasm, and a good eye for a new opportunity. A thorough understanding of the essential business functions, as explained in the fifth edition of Business Management for Entrepreneurs, is prerequisite reading for entrepreneurs who want to take their business to the next growth stage.

14.name: Business Management For Entrepreneurs 4th Edition
14.description: Being a successful entrepreneur in 2020s involves more than enthusiasm, and a good eye for a new opportunity. A thorough understanding of the essential business functions, as explained in the fourth edition of Business Management for Entrepreneurs, is prerequisite reading for entrepreneurs who want to take their business to the next growth stage.

15.name: Starting Out with C++ from Control Structures through Objects
15.description: Starting Out with C++: From Control Structures through Objects covers control structures, functions, arrays, and pointers before objects and classes in Tony Gaddis’s hallmark accessible, step-by-step presentation. His books help beginning students understand the important details necessary to become skilled programmers at an introductory level. Gaddis motivates the study of both programming skills and the C++ programming language by presenting all the details needed to understand the “how” and the “why”–but never losing sight of the fact that most beginners struggle with this material.

16.name: Naruto Shippuden - Headband - Konoha
16.description: Become a ninja from Konoha with this wonderful Naruto Shippuden headband by ABYstyle.

18.name: Xbox Series X Diablo IV & Carbon Black Controller Bundle
18.description: Xbox Series X Diablo IV & Carbon Black Controller Bundle

19.name: Monopoly Warhammer 40k
19.description: The world's favourite family board game brings you another exciting MONOPOLY – Warhammer Edition!

20.name: CLUEDO: HARRY POTTER
20.description: Discover the secrets of Hogwarts in this version of the classic Mystery game. A fellow student has vanished from the famous School of Witchcraft and Wizardry--and it is up to you to solve the mysterious disappearance. Play as Harry, Ron, Hermione, Ginny, Luna or Neville and try to discover who did it, what spell or item they used, and where the student was attacked.

21.name: LEGO Brawls
21.description: At the core of the game is the ability for players to build, customise and level up their ultimate LEGO Minifigure heroes with unique style, strategy, and personality. LEGO fans and brawlers can collect unlockable minifigures, power-ups and emotes from their favourite LEGO themes as they battle and build their way to the top of the global leader boards. Players around the world can team up and brawl 4v4, party with friends or play a battle royale-style game mode, or the fan-favourite “couch co-op” style Free-for-Brawl game mode where it’s “every-player-for-themselves”.

22.name: FIFA 23 (XBSX)
22.description: EA SPORTS FIFA 23 brings even more of the action and realism of football to the pitch in The World's Game. Play the biggest tournaments in football with both the men's and women's FIFA World Cup tournaments coming to FIFA 23 during the season, play as women's club teams for the first time ever, plus enjoy cross-play features that make it easier to play against friends. Enjoy a new way to play and build your dream squad in FIFA Ultimate Team with FUT Moments and a revamped Chemistry system, or live out your football dreams in Career Mode as you define your personality as a player and manage as some of football's most famous names. In VOLTA FOOTBALL and Pro Clubs, bring more personality to the pitch with new levels of customisation and enhanced street and stadium gameplay. However you play, experience The World's Game with over 19,000 players, 700+ teams, 100+ stadiums, and over 30 leagues - including the UEFA Champions League, Premier League, new Barclays FA Women's Super League and France D1 Arkema with unrivalled authenticity in FIFA 23.

23.name: Funko POP! Games #629: Pokémon – Flareon
23.description: From Pokémon it’s Flareon as a stylized Funko POP! Vinyl figure!

24.name: Funko POP! Games #580: Pokémon – Vulpix
24.description: From Pokémon it’s Vulpix as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko!

25.name: Diablo IV (PS4)
25.description: The endless battle between the High Heavens and the Burning Hells rages on as chaos threatens to consume Sanctuary. With ceaseless demons to slaughter, countless Abilities to master, nightmarish Dungeons, and Legendary loot, this vast, open world brings the promise of adventure and devastation. Survive and conquer darkness – or succumb to the shadows.

27.name: Ride 5 Day One Edition (PS5)
27.description: Just like your inner impulse to be the best, RIDE 5 was born with the very same vocation for greatness. A new, stunning level of realism and lifelike experiences, made for Next Gen consoles showing the true commitment to deliver the most authentic and exciting riding simulation ever.

28.name: Atlas Fallen
28.description: Glide the sands of a timeless land, filled with ancient dangers, mysteries and fragments of the past. Hunt legendary monsters, using powerful, shape-shifting weapons and devastating sand-powered abilities in spectacular, super-powered combat. Target and gather the essence of your enemies to shape your own custom playstyle, forging a new era for humanity in a fully cooperative or solo story campaign.

29.name: Spider-Man Walkie Talkie Action Figure Set
29.description: Spiderman figurines that double as walkie talkies

30.name: Angel Goku
30.description: 'I am the hope of the universe…I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace…I am the protector of the innocent…I am the light in the darkness…I am truth. Ally to good…Nightmare to you!'– Goku, ‘Dragon Ball Z’

31.name: Ultimate Shaving Care Bundle
31.description: Everything you need for a dreamy smooth shave. Prep, hydrate + treat in-growns. This 4-step shave routine elevates the shaving experience to the next level while leaving you irritation-free and smelling like a coconut scented snack!

32.name: Anti Body Acne Bundle
32.description: Body Acne? You're DONE! A step-by-step bundle designed to scrub away ickies, reduce redness and active breakouts all while healing acne scars and preventing further acne flare ups. You heard it right- Your skin will be looking and feeling smooth, even and radiant *in-love eyes*

33.name: Wax Care Bundle
33.description: Everything you need for a dreamy smooth wax. Prep, hydrate + treat in-growns. This 3-step pre/post wax routine elevates the waxing experience to the next level while leaving you irritation-free and smelling like a coconut scented snack!

34.name: Kerastase Elixir Ultime L'Original 100ml
34.description: A multi-use, leave-in hair oil that works to beautify the appearance of dull hair. The shine-enhancing oil can be used as a primer, finisher or refresher, sealing the look of split ends and smoothing the hair fibre for a sleek and perfected finish. Delivering long-lasting frizz control and heat protection up to 230°C, the leave-in treatment melts into hair to instantly refine and enhance shine for healthy-looking, beautified locks.

35.name: Kerastase Nutritive Masquintense 200ml
35.description: Nutritive Masquintense is a highly concentrated hair treatment that provides intensive moisture. The formula is suitable for dry, particularly fine to medium hair types. It strengthens and protects against dehydration and restores the natural moisture content of the hair. For added elasticity and manageability. The ingredients found in this formula nourish, strengthen and moisturises. The key active ingredients are herbal proteins and niacinamide.

36.name: Kerastase Nutritive Nectar Thermique 150ml
36.description: Prime your hair for heat styling with Kerastase Nutritive Nectar Thermique, a leave-in heat protection treatment that works to shield and smooth your hair.

37.name: Kerastase Chroma Absolu Sérum Chroma Thermique 150ml
37.description: A universal anti-frizz antioxidant thermic leave-in serum for all sensitized or damaged color-treated hair. A white fluid texture enriched with antioxidants properties, lactic acid & centella asiatica helps to preserve color by completely shielding fiber against all types of external aggressors: UV induced damage, humidity, heat and oxidative stress.

38.name: L'OREAL CURL EXPRESSION LONG LASTING INTENSIVE MOISTURIZER 200ML
38.description: Curl Expression long lasting intensive leave in moisturizer is designed to style curls and coils, the pro way. It intensely moisturizes even the most dehydrated curls and coils, for a silky-smooth result that lasts and 2 times more hydration. It protects hair against heat up to 230 °C/450 F

39.name: Paul Mitchell Clean Beauty Styling Cream 100ml
39.description: Made with 88% natural origin ingredients, this versatile, multi-benefit styling cream softens, smoothes and seals hair. Infused with flax seed and ferulic acid to strengthen and protect strands, the lightweight formula delivers memory and control with a clean, touchable feel.

40.name: Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Shampoo 300ml
40.description: Tea Tree Special Shampoo gently washes away impurities. Great for all hair types, this invigorating cleanser leaves strands refreshingly clean and full of shine. Natural tea tree oil and peppermint soothe the scalp, while light notes of lavender leave hair smelling fresh.

41.name: Ultra Grip 4 RC - Gloves - Orange
41.description: Add power to the game with the PUMA Ultra Grip 4 RC Goalkeeper Gloves featuring a supersoft latex palm offering grip and flexibility, offering 2mm of high elasticity.

42.name: adidas Predator FG Boot
42.description: Predator isn't just a boot. It's a statement that actions speak louder than words. If you can't back your chat with total control, pipe down. But if you're ready to dominate to the final whistle, keep reading. The supportive mesh upper on these football boots provides a sock-like fit to securely lock you in. Embossing on the forefoot grips the ball to add control when passing and shooting.

43.name: Puma CAGE Ball
43.description: PUMA’s collection of graphic balls brings highly-visible, modern design to the street, park, cage and playground. In using different base materials, such as hologram, chrome and matt de luxe, this range of balls stands out on the ball walls and shelves.

44.name: Men’s Golden State Warriors Stephen Curry No.30 Blue 19-20 Swingman Jersey – Icon Edition
44.description: Men’s Golden State Warriors Stephen Curry No.30 Blue 19-20 Swingman Jersey – Icon Edition

45.name: Men’s Denver Nuggets Jamal Murray No.27 Nike Navy 202021 Swingman Jersey – Icon Edition
45.description: Men’s Denver Nuggets Jamal Murray No.27 Nike Navy 202021 Swingman Jersey – Icon Edition

46.name: Oracle Red Bull F1 Racing Team Polo 2023
46.description: Oracle Red Bull F1 Racing Team Polo 2023

47.name: Manchester United Backpack
47.description: A versatile pack that shows exactly who you back. Show your support for Manchester United with this football backpack. Designed to securely store all your goodies, it has a spacious main compartment, a padded area that keeps your laptop within easy reach and zip pockets on the side and front.

48.name: Puma Team Duffel Bag - Small
48.description: Bring all of your sports kit on match day with the PUMA Small duffel Teambag which contains three zipped compartments that vary in size. Transport all of your sports gear with the PUMA Small Teambag, which is manufactured with sturdy polyester to give you a durable and practical holdall. Perfect for match day, this bag has a main compartment fastened with a two way zip, while the two additional zipped pockets allow you to store further smaller items securely. The adjustable shoulder straps are padded, while the carrying handles can be joined together with a velcro fastening for more comfort.

49.name: Puma Team Duffel Bag - Medium
49.description: Bring all of your sports kit on match day with the PUMA Medium Teambag which contains three zipped compartments that vary in size. Transport all of your sports gear with the PUMA Medium Teambag, which is manufactured with sturdy polyester to give you a durable and practical bag. Perfect for an away day or trip to the gym, this bag has a spacious main compartment to hold the bulk of your items, while the two additional zipped pockets allow you to store further smaller items securely. The adjustable shoulder straps are padded, while the carrying handles can be joined together with a velcro fastening for more comfort.

50.name: Argentina 3 Stars Jersey Home Whole Kit(Jersey+Shorts+Socks) Replica World Cup 2022
50.description: Argentina 3 Stars Jersey Home Whole Kit(Jersey+Shorts+Socks) Replica World Cup 2022

51.name: ASUS Laptop X515
51.description: Asus X515ja-i342G5W - i3 (Dual core) + 4Gb + 256GB SSD + FHD

52.name: Volkano Phonic Bluetooth Headphones
52.description: The Volkano Phonic Series! These Bluetooth Wireless headphones feature high quality immersive sound and a playtime of up to 24-hours on a full charge, keeping you jamming and comfortable literally ALL day long. Hands-free technology also allows you to answer calls and sit through online meetings with no distractions and without having to look at your device! They also feature a built-in FM Radio function and other additional input options such as an AUX jack input port and a Micro SD Card reader input. Don't have any devices that support Bluetooth? Use the included Aux cable to connect to any device with an earphone jack. The Sleek design of the Phonics is unmatched in every regard. They feature on-ear control buttons to allow you to control your volume and switch between your tracks without needing to consult your device. When you are done with them, they conveniently fold away in a great compact design allowing you to store and transport them with ease. The soft foam ear cushions are ergonomically designed for comfortable long-term wear. Enjoy HOURS of your favourite music without any discomfort! SPECIFICATIONS: Bluetooth Version: 5.0 Range: 10 m Sensitivity: 108 dB Driver: 40 mm Impedance : 64 Charge Time: 2.5 Hours Playback Time: 18 - 24 Hours Battery Capacity: 400 mAh Frequency Response: 20 Hz - 20 kHz Charge Input: 15 V DC / 1.0 A FEATURES AND BENEFITS Hands-free Calling Built-in FM Radio Removable Aux Cable Aux and SD Card Input Up to 24 Hours Playtime

53.name: Volkano Equinox Series True Wireless Earphones
53.description: The Equinox series by Volkano. These compact true wireless Bluetooth earbuds are designed just for you. With a playback time of between 3 to 4 hours on a full charge. With a charging carry case, you can re-juice your buds on the go up to 3 times before it needs a charge again. With hands-free calling technology AND Google and Siri Voice Assistance Technology, the Equinox series is designed to simplify your life. True stereo sound delivers your music with deep bass notes and clear sound. SPECIFICATIONS: Bluetooth Version: 5.0 Distance: 10 m Charging Case: Battery: 1800 mAh Number of Recharges: 3 Charging Time: 1.5 Hours Charge Input: 5 V DC Earphones: Battery: 30 mAh per Earphone Playback Time: 3 – 4 Hours Sensitivity: 105±3dB Driver: 10 mm Impedance: 32 ? Frequency Response: 20 Hz ~ 20 kHz FEATURES AND BENEFITS: Hands-Free Calling True Wireless Stereo Google/Siri Voice Assistant

54.name: CYCLONE VACUUM CLEARNER CONTI HAND HELD
54.description: Conti stick vacuum cleaner. 2 in 1 handheld stick vacuum cleaner. Bagless Technology. Cyclone system. Easy-Empty dust cap. Capacity 0.5 litres. Suction power 90 watt. Vacuum 14Kpa. Air flow 0.80meter square per minute. Noise 70dB. 230V~50Hz 600watt

57.name: Ferre 50 x 60 4 Gas, Gas Oven, FFD, Ignition, Silver
57.description: Ferre 50 x 60 4 Gas, Gas Oven, FFD, Ignition, Silver

59.name: Ellies High Surge Safe Power Protector with Euro Socket

62.name: ORICO 7.4cm Desktop Monitor Stand with Drawers - White
62.description: The Orico Monitor Stand Riser is a great way to keep your desk organized while at the same time improving your overall posture. It features a functional design that keeps your workspace as tidy as possible. It also features a desk organizer with 3 drawers that can store almost all of your small daily supplies and stationery. It also comes with a convenient phone and tablet holder which is a groove on top of the stand that helps you hold your cellphone or tablet while watching your favourite videos. The Stand Riser is made from a thick ABS material, making it not only durable but water-proof and scratch-resistant.

63.name: Corsair K70 RGB PRO Mechanical Gaming Keyboard with PBT DOUBLE SHOT PRO Keycaps - CHERRY MX Blue
63.description: Corsair K70 RGB PRO Mechanical Gaming Keyboard with PBT DOUBLE SHOT PRO Keycaps - CHERRY MX Blue

64.name: Corsair HS35 Stereo Gaming Headset Green

65.name: Razer Kaira Wireless Gaming Headset for Xbox Series X|S
65.description: Razer Kaira Wireless Gaming Headset for Xbox Series X|S

66.name: 4Gamers MARAUDER Gaming Headset
66.description: The MARAUDER is a multi-platform Gaming Headset. Compatible with PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Series S, Series X, Nintendo Switch, PC and mobile devices. It has a super lightweight, comfortable design featuring soft-foam, leatherette ear cushions and padded headband with a flexible mic. The MARAUDER speakers and mic are designed for immersive game audio and clear chat during gaming sessions with friends. In-line controls make adjusting game audio and chat volume simple and easy to reach.

67.name: Asus ROG Strix Arion S500 Portable SSD 500GB
67.description: Asus ROG Strix Arion S500 Portable SSD 500GB

69.name: Intel Core i5-13600KF Processor

71.name: Intel Core i9-13900KF Processor
71.description: Intel Core i9-13900KF Processor - No Fan. 36M Cache, up to 5.80 GHz

73.name: Adata P20000D Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
73.description: The ADATA P20000D Portable Power Bank makes it clear what a flagship power bank is. Packing 20000mAh, this beast is tamed with a high precision digital display that lets you know exactly how much power remains. It also has a bright LED flashlight for added utility and safety. We placed dual USB charging ports on the P20000D so you can top up two devices at once to save time, and bulked it up with robust protective measures. The P20000D embodies ultimate – it’s the envy of all other power banks!

74.name: Bitty Boomers TMNT Bebop Bluetooth Speaker
74.description: Cowabunga, Dude! The bungling bad guy Bebop now comes in a 2' tall ultra-portable Bluetooth speaker. Don't be fooled though, what they lack in size they make up for with mind-blowing sound.

75.name: Corsair CX Series CX750F RGB 750W 80 Plus Bronze Certified Fully Modular RGB PSU - Opened Box
75.description: Corsair CX Series CX750F RGB — 750 Watt 80 Plus Bronze Certified Fully Modular RGB PSU. *PLEASE NOTE* The box has been opened but the PSU is still brand new and full warranty is still applicable. CORSAIR CX-750F RGB Series fully modular power supplies deliver reliable 80 PLUS Bronze efficient power to your system, alongside vibrant customizable lighting from a 120mm RGB fan and a clean aesthetic.

76.name: TITAN Elecstor Mini DC UPS 12000mAh – Backup Power for Router
76.description: Titan Elecstor 18W Mini DC UPS 12000mAh – 38WH will power your router and fibre box during power outages. Lasts between 3-5 hours. The Titan 18W 12000mAh 38Wh Elecstor Mini DC UPS is simple to install and can power multiple devices during a power outage. With multiple-voltage DC outputs, this UPS can power both a router and fibre ONU (Optical Network Unit) for uninterrupted internet usage while working, streaming, or gaming. This device can also charge cell phones, tablets, and other digital devices via the USB port. The Titan Elecstor Mini UPS features LiFeP04 batteries (12000mAh) with safety protocols such as over-charge, over-discharge, and short circuit protection.

77.name: Candy Breeze Bagless Vacuum Cleaner CBR2020016
77.description: Introducing the Candy Breeze Bagless Vacuum Cleaner CBR2020016. With 2000W power, 2L cyclonic capacity, and Hepa 12 filter, it ensures thorough cleaning. Quiet at 78dBA, its telescopic metal pipes and 5m cable provide effortless reach. Comes with a variety of accessories for versatile cleaning.

78.name: Salton Y Peeler
78.description: TPR handle and stainless-steel for firm grip. Food safe. Easy to clean.

79.name: Russell Hobbs Electric Can Opener
79.description: Opening cans has never been more efficient with the Russell Hobbs Can Opener. Its stainless steel decoration and embedded grindstone will give you the edge in your kitchen. The machine automatically opens cans which makes this appliance hassle-free and stylish. Convenience has never looked so good.

81.name: Stingray Casa Red Glass Kitchen Scale
81.description: Stingray Casa Red Glass Kitchen Scale

85.name: Samsung 50″ UHD 4K Smart TV
85.description: Experience lifelike picture quality with the Samsung 50″ CU7000 Crystal UHD 4K Smart TV. Its PurColor technology delivers vibrant colors, while the Crystal Processor 4K ensures stunning 4K resolution. With Smart Hub and SmartThings, you can easily access and control your favorite content and smart devices. Enjoy immersive sound and a sleek design.

86.name: Russell Hobbs 30L Electronic Microwave
86.description: The Russell Hobbs 30L Electronic Microwave 862882 offers convenient and efficient cooking. With its 900W power output, 11 power levels, and programmable multi-stage cooking, it ensures precision and versatility. The microwave features a user-friendly control panel, 6 auto menus, a 99-minute cooking timer, and defrost options.

87.name: Alliance 8L Digital Air Fryer
87.description: Introducing the Alliance 8L Digital Air Fryer. With 1700W power, 7 pre-sets, and adjustable temperature settings, it delivers crispy and delicious results. The detachable basket, non-stick coating, and over heating protection make cooking easy and safe. Upgrade your kitchen with this versatile air fryer today.

88.name: Alliance 3L Gas/Stovetop Kettle
88.description: Introducing the Alliance 3L Gas/Stovetop Kettle AHA-SK-30-B. This versatile kettle is suitable for Gas, Electric, Induction, and Ceramic cooktops. With its sleek glass and stainless-steel finish, 3L capacity, and convenient features like the automatic lid opener and whistle function, it’s the perfect addition to any kitchen.

104.description: Pink Scoop Neck Sleeveless Sports Bra

108.description: Kids White Skylar Golfer Dress & Leggings Set

109.description: Blue Long Sleeve Tee & Leggings Set

110.description: Kids Red Gabriella Hooded Sweater Dress

111.name: Vegan Coconut & Cranberry Rusks
111.description: Vegan or not, you are going to love these!  Made with coconut cream and cranberries, these rusks, packed with pumpkin seeds and almonds, are an indulgent treat!

112.name: Bran & Honey Rusks
112.description: These traditional bran rusks are made with pure honey from our valley - a delicious combination!

113.name: Oats & Bran Flakes Rusks
113.description: Our Oats & Bran flake rusks are a firm favourite in the Mamamac's bakery as well as many a home. We've combined rolled oats and bran flakes for a healthy and hearty rusk.

114.name: Buttermilk Rusks
114.description: Made with real buttermilk the good old-fashioned way. Take our word for it, you're going to need more than 1 bag of these delicious buttermilk rusks!

115.name: Choc Chip Biscuits
115.description: Chocolaty and indulgent, made from real chocolate chips. You can take our word on this, you're going to want to order some extra.

116.name: Bran & Multiseed Rusks
116.description: Our Bran & Multiseed rusks are a beautiful blend of sunflower, poppy, sesame and linseeds. The ultimate good-for-you rusk!

117.name: Buttermilk & Sunflower Seeds Rusks

168.name: Ice Tray Snowva
168.description: With the Snowva™ Ultimate Ice Tray you make 80 large, solid blocks of ice in your home or outdoor freezer. The reusable Snowva™ is made of quality material and really easy to use – just fill, freeze, twist and you’ve got 1.6kg of ice! Snowva™ saves pace in your freezer and is stackable should you use more than one. Making ice has never been so easy.

169.name: Hagerty Silver Foam 185ml
169.description:
Fast-acting cleaning foam for silver and silver coated objects.
Foaming paste to clean and maintain silver, silver-plated metal, pewter and steel.
Cleans and takes care of silver, silver-plated, pewter and steel objects.
It allows to maintain, to restore and to polish oxidized metals without scratching the surface.
The paste gives back brightness to the objects.
Silver and Multimetal Foam makes tarnished silver, silver-plated, pewter and steel objects shine.
It maintains in depth tarnished silver and the other metals.
The foaming paste protects from oxidation for several weeks and removes dirt from silvery.
The care acts rapidly, is efficient and does not damage the objects.
The paste is very efficient. Its quick action makes particularly useful for the maintenance of silver, silver-plated, pewter, stainless steel objects which are used frequently for the service.It contains soap and vegetal solvents.
The paste has almost instant effects and does not cause any scratches or marks on the metals.
How to use the product:
– Apply silver foam to the dampened sponge and work into a foam.
– Wash.
– Rinse with warm water and dry with a soft cloth.

170.name: Noritake Arctic White Dinner Plate 27cm
170.description: rctic White has been Noritake’s No.1 selling casual pattern for over a decade and it’s easy to see why. The contemporary design in white features a circular embossed rim on a fine china body making it versatile enough to be used for a casual breakfast setting or it can just as easily be ‘dressed up’ for formal dining.

171.name: Noritake Arctic White Side Plate 18cm
171.description: Contemporary design in white with a subtle circular embossed rim on a fine white porcelain body. Arctic white is a stylish pattern that is versatile enough be used as a casual breakfast setting or can just as easily be ‘dressed up’ for formal dining.

172.name: Maxwell Williams Caviar Side Plate 15cm Black
172.description: Made from prestige porcelain with a unique textured glaze, this Caviar Coupe Plate by Maxwell & Williams has a gorgeously natural hand-feel. The Caviar collection is striking addition to the Maxwell & Williams range and is a modern alternative to traditional white settings. Microwave, oven and dishwasher safe.

174.name: Kilner Spice Jar Square 70ml
174.description: The Kilner 70ml Square Clip Top Spice Jar is ideal for storing herbs and spices. The airtight rubber seal keeps the contents fresher for longer. They are also ideal for storing dry food, such as rice, sugar, flour, lentils etc.

175.name: Victorinox Tomato/Steak Knife Serrated Blue 11cm
175.description: Stand up to tomato skin, show that melon who’s boss. Neither fruits nor vegetables can withstand the sharp wavy edge of our paring knife. And with its ergonomic handle and perfect size, you might even use it to cut everything else in the kitchen as well.

176.name: Maxwell Williams Caviar Cup & Saucer 250ml Black
176.description: With a contemporary matte finish and a unique textured glaze, Caviar by Maxwell & Williams is a striking alternative to traditional white settings. Made from prestige porcelain with a gorgeously natural hand-feel. Bring some café culture to your home with this sleek Caviar Cup and Saucer.

177.name: Maxwell Williams Ramekin 6.5cm
177.description: Embrace classic styling, with the versatility of the White Basics Ramekin, from Maxwell & Williams. Made from oven, freezer, microwave and dishwasher-safe prestige porcelain. Let your recipes shine.

179.name: Kilner Butter Churner
179.description:
Take delicious, homemade butter with the Kilner® Butter Churner.
Simply place double cream into the glass jar base, attach the lid with the churning mechanism and turn the handle which starts to rotate the paddles.
Continue to churn for around 10 minutes until the butter fat separates from the butter milk.
Strain away the butter milk and shape the butter fat using the Kilner® Butter Paddles. The butter milk can be utilized for pancakes or scone mixtures.
Create individual flavors by seasoning and adding herbs and spices.
A recipe and instruction booklet is included to guide you through the process.

181.name: Tablecloth Earth Stone 180x180cm
181.description: Casual, elegant or sophisticated – whatever your style, we have the design for you! We never compromise on quality, ensuring all our products are machine washable and suitable for everyday use.

182.name: Maxwell Williams Napkin Set of 4 Pebble 45x45cm
182.description:
These Cotton Classics napkins in pebble are the perfect way to add the finishing
touches to your table setting. Made from easy-care, high-quality cotton, they
bring a touch of sophistication to any occasion. This set of four is perfect to
mix and match with the rest of the Cotton Classics collection – and they
coordinate beautifully with your favourite Maxwell & Williams dinnerware.

183.name: Banhoek Chilli Oil Wrapped 250ml
183.description: Only the finest, 100% South African ingredients go into Banhoek Chilli Oil. It’s handmade in small batches and uniquely cooked using induction heating to ensure consistent heating levels that other methods simply can’t beat.

184.name: Funky Ouma Mini Black Garlic 80g
184.description: This is a very trendy and flavorful salt.Himalayan salt and fermented garlic (black garlic).This is a natural substitute to table salt.

185.name: Funky Ouma Mini Himalayan & Herb Salt 80g
185.description: A Healthy Alternative for salt and spice lovers.Himalayan salt mixed with fresh home-grown herbs and spices.Perfect for any meat, veggies, egg or salad. A Perfect all-rounder salt

189.name: Funky Ouma Tin Olive Oil 500ml
189.description: This olive oil is a blend of Frantoio, Leccino and Mission olives grown in the Windmeul or Voor Paardeberg area just north of Paarl.

190.name: Darling Sweet Rooi Bos Chai Toffee 150g
190.description: The soothing full-bodied flavor of indigenous Rooibos, which has been a trusted South African favorite for generations, and the warm, spicy notes of Eastern chai offset by our rich butter-caramel toffee makes for an unforgettable experience.

191.name: Funky Ouma Mini Braai & Cooking Salt 70g
191.description: Plain salt and Himalayan salt mixed with fresh home-grown herbs and spices.

192.name: Darling Sweet Summer Berry Soft Caramels 150g
192.description: The summery flavors of strawberry, raspberry and sour cherry add a refreshing tang to these soft rich butter caramels.

193.name: Funky Ouma Africa Rub Travel Tin
193.description: A firm favorite and very tasty!Rub generously on your choice of meat before cooking. This is a versatile all-rounder rub with natural ingredients.

194.name: Darling Sweet Assorted Toffees 360g
194.description: 360g assorted box consists of 6 Darling Sweet toffee flavors. The flavors are Tannie Evita’s Classic, Honey & Salt, Bird’s Eye Chili, Liquorice toffee, Coffee toffee & Mint toffee.

195.name: Cape Fynbos Olive Oil Tin 500ml
195.description: African Oils are full of natural goodness, with a good story to tell.To make them, the finest quality produce is sourced from environmentally sustainable growers across South Africa.

196.name: Cape Fynbos Olive Oil 250ml
196.description: This premium extra virgin olive oil is cold pressed and then infused with selected Fynbos plants.Fynbos is a family of fine-leaved shrubs endemic to South Africa’s Cape coastal regions.

198.name: Funky Ouma Olive Oil 250ml Convenient
198.description: Enjoy our Funky Ouma Extra Virgin Olive Oil in a beautiful 500ml tin or in a 250ml convenient bottle.Perfect for cooking or as a gift.

212.name: Men’s Miami Heat Tyler Herro #14 White 19-20 Swingman Jersey – City Edition

213.name: Men’s Atlanta Hawks Trae Young #11 Jordan Brand Black 2020/21 Swingman Jersey – Statement Edition

215.name: HAMI HIVE Hammock
215.description: The Hive Hammock's bright yellow is all about getting out into the sunshine. Hang out in your HAMI Hive hammock while setting up camp, out in nature with your friends or set up your own little urban jungle at home. Keep up with the everyday buzz by taking a little hammock nap every once in a while, it’s a new kind of power nap! This time snuggled in a hammock.

216.name: HAMI OCEAN Hammock
216.description: The HAMI Ocean Hammock's cool, calm and collected blue is designed to draw you to the seaside. Slip into this oceanic chill pod like hammock for the ultimate sensory deprivation experience: Sun, sand and sea just got better. Surf’s up! Hammock's up!

217.name: HAMI EVERGREEN Hammock
217.description: The Evergreen Hammock's vibrant green was chosen to lure you into the living, breathing trees that keep our planet alive. Strap up in your hammock and hang out and see who else lives in the forest. The outdoors is nature's playground, especially when you are nested in your HAMI hammock.

218.name: HAMI CORAL Hammock
218.description: The HAMI Coral Hammock takes inspiration from the vibrant colours of underwater reefs. Soak up the energy of the sun and sway in the cool breeze while tucked inside the HAMI Coral Hammock and feel totally at peace, just as you would underwater.

219.name: OCEAN ECO-SACK
219.description: The HAMI ECO-SACK is a comfortable, long strapped shoulder bag and an alternative to grocery bags. Purchase one to carry your HAMI home, and re-use it on the beach, while shopping, for picnics and when out and about. The HAMI ECO-SACK is made of 100% recycled materials.

220.name: CORAL ECO-SACK
220.description: The HAMI ECO-SACK is a comfortable, long strapped shoulder bag and an alternative to grocery bags. Purchase one to carry your HAMI home, and re-use it on the beach, while shopping, for picnics and when out and about. The HAMI ECO-SACK is made of 100% recycled materials.

221.name: EVERGREEN ECO-SACK
221.description: The HAMI ECO-SACK is a comfortable, long strapped shoulder bag and an alternative to grocery bags. Purchase one to carry your HAMI home, and re-use it on the beach, while shopping, for picnics and when out and about. The HAMI ECO-SACK is made of 100% recycled materials.

222.name: HAMI CARABINERS
222.description: Hook up your HAMI with our custom designer set of heavy duty steel HAMI carabiners on both ends with a weight rating of 1200kg (each carabiner weighs 60g)

223.name: Unicorn Crush
223.description: With a base of shea butter this buttery, deeply conditioning, multi-coloured body moisturiser is packed with a blend of natural, skin-repairing ingredients such as vitamin E, jojoba oil and rose water. The added essential oils restore skins elasticity leaving your skin nourished, firm and smooth. This all rounding, best seller will leave you feeling flawless in minutes!

224.name: For Your Buns, Hun
224.description: Feel the luxurious velvety booty butter that is our best selling For Your Buns, Hun. It's two key ingredients are wheat protein and pomegranate extract. Wheat protein and apricots oil increase the firmness of the skin, while minimising the appearance of fine lines and cellulite. Amino-rich pomegranate alongside grapeseed oil will intensely hydrate and plump your skin, reducing the appearance of stretch marks leaving your skin healthy and happy!

225.name: Easy Tiger
225.description: Our ultra hydrating booty oil will become your stretchies bestie. Collagen boosting flaxseed oil and regenerative pomegranate will leave your buns looking firm, glowing and stretch mark free in no time.

226.name: Body Slush
226.description: Our full body SUGAR SCRUB is now here! This deeply conditioning whipped scrub is the perfect in-shower exfoliator and moisturiser. Body Slush is packed with naturally nourishing ingredients such as coconut oil which leaves your skin feeing moisturised and soft post shower. The sugar granules gently exfoliate and buff away dead skin cells,  giving you that energised and rejuvenated glow!

227.name: Moonshine
227.description: Become glowing skin goals with our brightening body oil designed to tackle discolouration, dark spots and dryness in areas that need a little extra boost.

228.name: Glow Getter
228.description: A whipped body butter that is made to brighten and lighten dark skin areas, treat hyper-pigmentation and promote an even, radiant and visible GLOW! Get those inner thighs, knees, elbows and under arms in check with our newest go-to.

229.name: Bright Skin Bish
229.description: Scrubbing away dark skin areas and spots one shower at a time with our brightening body polish! The natural oils, exfoliating sugar granules and Vitamin E promote an even, radiant GLOW! Get those inner thighs, knees, elbows and under arms fully flawless in minutes.

230.name: Fairy Potion
230.description: Fairy Potion is a fast absorbing and super hydrating daily post shave oil that replenishes lost moisture and intensely nourishes while combating in-growns and healing active inflammation + bumps.

231.name: Bumps Be Gone
231.description: This anti-blemish butter works with key ingredients such as grapefruit, tea tree and rosemary essential oil which are well known for their spot fighting properties. While nourishing your skin with the shea butter base, these essential oils will be absorbed deeply into the skin to actively fight impurities and soothe painful, irritated skin.

232.name: Spot Doctor
232.description: A lightweight and quick absorbing anti-acne oil that reduces inflammation and redness in active breakouts while healing acne scars. Packed with all the goodness your skins heart desires, you can kiss your bod'ne goodbye!

233.name: Clear Skin Check
233.description: A whipped anti-blemish polishing scrub that is made to clear breakouts and buff off excess dirt, oil and dead skin. RIP old skin and hello smooth skin glow!

234.name: In-grown SOS
234.description: Say good bye to in-growns, irritation and razor bumps and hello to a care-free date night with our new coconut after-shave butter. Super silky and carefully innovated, our post-shaving/waxing body butter nourishes sensitive skin and calms inflammation and redness. Your cooka will thank you later!
